backend/main.mo: Main backend actor providing user profiles, audio submission metadata, and access‑controlled queries and mutations using AccessControl and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI refinement features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to brief functional descriptions for documentation or build planning.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERIFICATION.md: Deployment verification checklist detailing visual, functional, and QA checks for the premium header and landing page update.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for themes, dark mode tokens, and global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point containing the root div and script loader for the frontend app.
Shell script to redeploy the frontend canister with retry logic, environment checks, and post‑deployment instructions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping the router in AuthProvider to provide authentication context across all routes.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin UI listing pending submissions, approved audio, and user profiles with approve/reject actions.
frontend/src/components/CreatorZoneAuthC: Shows a logout button for authenticated creators; hidden otherwise.
frontend/src/components/CreatorZoneTab.t: Form for creators to submit audio metadata for admin approval, including idle logout notice handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders site footer with credits and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenLoadin: Full‑screen loading spinner with optional message.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling login state, profile retrieval, admin studio access, and user menu.
frontend/src/components/RouteAccessGuard: Route guard enforcing admin vs non‑admin access and blocking rendering until role resolution.
frontend/src/components/TestingModeBanne: Displays a fixed banner indicating the app is in testing mode.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Authentication context managing identity state, idle logout, and login/logout flows.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, admin state, and artist data via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables for light and dark themes and global typography settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: A simple homepage displaying a welcome message and the CreatorZoneTab component.
frontend/src/pages/Studio.tsx: Admin studio page that loads the user profile and renders the AdminPanel once ready.
frontend/src/router.ts: Creates and exports the TanStack Router instance using the defined route tree.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the application’s root, home, and studio routes with layout wrappers and access guard.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color variables, container settings, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Holds the current VAANI Studio project state, including UI‑polish goals, existing features, new feature requests, and design direction notes.
